SELECT T.ORDER_ID orderId, T.RECEIVABLE_AMT receivableAmt, T.PAYABLE_AMT payableAmt, T1.BUSINESS_ID businessId, T7.event_id eventId, T3.CUSTOM_NAME customName, T3.WANGWANG_ACCNT wangwangAccnt, T2.COMPANY_NAME companyName, T2.COMPANY_ID companyId, T2.CITY city, T2.DISTRICT district, T1.REMARK remark, T3.WEIXIN_NAME weixinName, T4.BUSINESS_NAME businessName, (CASE WHEN T4.BUSINESS_NAME = '代理记账' THEN concat('代账开始:', DATE_FORMAT(T11.BEGIN_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'), ' 代账结束:', DATE_FORMAT(T11.END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE '' END) as businessInfo, DATEDIFF(NOW(),T7.begin_date) cost, DATEDIFF(T7.end_date,NOW()) maxLeftDay, T1.BUSINESS_TAG businessTag, T7.begin_date createDate, T3.CUSTOM_LEVEL customLevel, T8.name curNodeName, T8.node_id curNodeId, T7.cur_operator_name curOperatorName, T1.OWNER_ID ownerId, T1.OWNER owner, T10.USER_ID preSalesId, (CASE WHEN T1.NEED_THIRD_PARTY = '1' THEN concat(T12.DISTRICT,' ',T12.THIRD_PARTY_NAME) ELSE '' END) as thirdPartyInfo, T12.THIRD_PARTY_ID thirdPartyId, T1.THIRD_PARTY_FEE thirdPartyFee
FROM crm.CRM_CUSTOM_ORDER_INFO T left join crm.CRM_USER_CUSTOMER_INFO T10 ON T.CUSTOM_ID = T10.CUSTOMER_ID, crm.CRM_ORDER_BUSINESS_REL T1 left join crm.CRM_ORDER_DLJZ_DETAIL T11 on T1.EVENT_ID = T11.EVENT_ID left join crm.CRM_COMPANY_INFO T2 on T1.COMPANY_ID = T2.COMPANY_ID left join crm.CRM_COMPANY_BUSINESS T5 on T1.COMPANY_ID = T5.COMPANY_ID AND T1.BUSINESS_ID = T5.BUSINESS_ID left join crm.CRM_CUSTOM_THIRD_PARTY_INFO T12 on T1.THIRD_PARTY_ID = T12.THIRD_PARTY_ID, crm.CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO T3, crm.CRM_BUSINESS_DICT T4, work_flow.workflow_def_graph_business_rel T6, work_flow.workflow_event T7, work_flow.workflow_def_node T8, work_flow.workflow_def_node_ext_attr T9
T.ID = T1.ORDER_ID AND T.CUSTOM_ID = T3.CUSTOM_ID AND T1.BUSINESS_ID = T4.BUSINESS_ID AND T1.BUSINESS_ID = T6.business_id AND T7.cur_node_id = T8.node_id AND T1.EVENT_ID = T7.event_id and T6.graph_id = T7.graph_id and T6.graph_id = T8.graph_id AND T7.cur_node_id = T9.node_id AND not exists(select 1 from work_flow.workflow_event_dependency T9 where T7.event_id = T9.next_event) AND (T7.event_owner = #{query.userId} or T7.cur_operator = #{query.userId}) AND T7.BEGIN_DATE <= now()
and (T8.ROLE = #{query.pageRole} OR T8.ROLE = '')
and T2.CITY like concat('%', #{query.city}, '%')
and T2.DISTRICT like concat('%', #{query.district}, '%')
and T2.COMPANY_NAME like concat('%', #{query.companyName}, '%')
and T3.CUSTOM_NAME like concat('%', #{query.customName}, '%')
and T3.CUSTOM_LEVEL like concat('%', #{query.customLevel}, '%')
and T8.name like concat('%', #{query.curNodeName}, '%')
and T3.WEIXIN_NAME like concat('%', #{query.weixinName}, '%')
and DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_DATE,'%Y%m%d') = #{query.createDate}
and T4.BUSINESS_NAME like concat('%', #{query.businessName}, '%')
and T1.BUSINESS_TAG like concat('%', #{query.businessTag}, '%')
and T8.name != '结束'
group by T7.event_id ORDER BY T1.CREATE_DATE DESC
